get.description: Export the route information in the specified format by specifying the 'route_id' path parameter and by specifying the corresponding query parameters.

parameters.name: route_id
parameters.description: Route ID.

parameters.name: strExportFormat
parameters.description: Route export file format.  Available values: json, csv, xml, html.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Route export file format.  Available values: json, csv, xml, html.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start of the time range.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End of the time range.

parameters.name: with_addresses
parameters.description: If 'true', the route(s) will be exported, including all associated addresses.

parameters.name: with_notes
parameters.description: If 'true', the route(s) will be exported, including all associated notes.

parameters.name: with_actual_data
parameters.description: If 'true', the route(s) will be exported, including the 'Actual' data.

parameters.name: all_custom_fields
parameters.description: If 'true', the route(s) will be exported, including all associated custom data.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: If 'true', the route(s) will be exported as a file.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: The array of the associated column names will be included into the route export.

parameters.name: tz
parameters.description: Time Zone.
